{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Accountant Officer",
  "description": "Prisms Healthcare Limited is a radiology and a Pathology diagnostic centre which have been in Operations since October 16, 2000 (23 years) and have become a major player in the diagnostic sub-market of the healthcare industry in Nigeria. Our sole aim is to ensure continuous improvement of our patients&rsquo; health quotient.

At Prisms, we are well aware of the reputation your esteemed organization has developed over many years of operation. We appreciate the level of care that is required for what you do and understand your need for reliable diagnostic partnerships. This is why we believe we can be a beneficial partner in your quest for greater health and productivity of your patients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Accountant/ Finance Manager:


	Maintaining the integrity of the organization&rsquo;s financial and accounting processes through the exercise of appropriate monitoring and control over the organization&rsquo;s business processes.
	Primary responsibility for the management of the company&rsquo;s business and financial planning and budget performance and management functions.
	Ensuring the company&rsquo;s accounting procedures conform to international Financial Reporting Standards (FIRS) FRAMEWORK.
	Responsible for the design and implementation of best in class internal financial controls processes and procedures around all the operations of the company.
	Primary responsibility for monitoring compliance with all the borrowing customers involving the corporation.
	Ensure that appropriate financial management and control processes are in place to be achieved through close working relationships with the various centers.
	Ensuring daily, weekly and Monthly Banking transactions.
	Act as laisse to Bank account officers in the different banks of the corporation.
	Create financials for Auditor as at when due and for tax purposes.
	Prepare yearly financial forecast and goals.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a cover letter in PDF format to:&nbsp;mailhr@prismshealthcare.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

Accountant Officer Job at Prisms Healthcare Limited




        
    

        
        Prisms Healthcare Limited is a radiology and a Pathology diagnostic centre which have been in Operations since October 16, 2000 (23 years) and have become a major player in the diagnostic sub-market of the healthcare industry in Nigeria. Our sole aim is to ensure continuous improvement of our patients’ health quotient.

At Prisms, we are well aware of the reputation your esteemed organization has developed over many years of operation. We appreciate the level of care that is required for what you do and understand your need for reliable diagnostic partnerships. This is why we believe we can be a beneficial partner in your quest for greater health and productivity of your patients.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Accountant/ Finance Manager:


	Maintaining the integrity of the organization’s financial and accounting processes through the exercise of appropriate monitoring and control over the organization’s business processes.
	Primary responsibility for the management of the company’s business and financial planning and budget performance and management functions.
	Ensuring the company’s accounting procedures conform to international Financial Reporting Standards (FIRS) FRAMEWORK.
	Responsible for the design and implementation of best in class internal financial controls processes and procedures around all the operations of the company.
	Primary responsibility for monitoring compliance with all the borrowing customers involving the corporation.
	Ensure that appropriate financial management and control processes are in place to be achieved through close working relationships with the various centers.
	Ensuring daily, weekly and Monthly Banking transactions.
	Act as laisse to Bank account officers in the different banks of the corporation.
	Create financials for Auditor as at when due and for tax purposes.
	Prepare yearly financial forecast and goals.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and a cover letter in PDF format to: mailhr@prismshealthcare.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Officer",
  "description": "Stellar International Company Limited is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Co. Ltd has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Kogi
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a hardworking and reliable Warehouse Worker to join our team in Kogi.The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing inbound and outbound operations, ensuring efficient movement of goods, and carrying out all general warehouse duties to maintain smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and record incoming goods (inbound).
	Prepare and dispatch outgoing goods (outbound).
	Ensure accurate inventory management and stock control.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the warehouse at all times.
	Assist in loading and offloading of goods.
	Ensure all warehouse activities comply with company policies and safety standards.
	Support other operational tasks as assigned by the supervisor.


Benefits


	Basic Salary: N57,600 per month.&nbsp;
	Performance bonus: N35,200.
	1,500 daily transportation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.&nbsp;",

Warehouse Officer Job at Stellar International Company Limited




        
    

        
        Stellar International Company Limited is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Co. Ltd has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Officer

Job Location: Kogi
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a hardworking and reliable Warehouse Worker to join our team in Kogi.The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing inbound and outbound operations, ensuring efficient movement of goods, and carrying out all general warehouse duties to maintain smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and record incoming goods (inbound).
	Prepare and dispatch outgoing goods (outbound).
	Ensure accurate inventory management and stock control.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the warehouse at all times.
	Assist in loading and offloading of goods.
	Ensure all warehouse activities comply with company policies and safety standards.
	Support other operational tasks as assigned by the supervisor.


Benefits


	Basic Salary: N57,600 per month. 
	Performance bonus: N35,200.
	1,500 daily transportation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.     

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Frances Mcgreg Consulting (FMC) Services is a full-fledged business consulting company that covers talent acquisition and management, data analysis, organizational design and development, humanitarian activities and SDGs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a responsible and agile Administrative assistant to perform a variety of administrative and clerical tasks which include providing support to our walk-in clients and employees, assisting in daily office needs and managing our company&rsquo;s general administrative activities.


Job Responsibilities


	Attend to walk-in clients and answer to their inquiries.
	Submitting and reconciling expense reports.
	Arranging vehicle transportation, maintenance, and insurance.
	Order office supplies and maintain inventory, maintaining office stationery supplies and distribution.
	Assist with shortlisting candidates and scheduling interviews.
	Maintaining a filing system to ensure the safekeeping of confidential materials.
	Researching and retrieving statistical data from internal and external sources.
	Following up on deadlines and commitments.
	Supporting office maintenance and assets management.
	Determine and establish office procedures and routines.
	Schedule and confirm appointments.
	Answer telephone and relay telephone calls and messages.
	Answer electronic enquiries.
	Compile data and other information.
	Arrange travel, and elated itineraries and make reservations.
	Greet people and direct them to contacts or service areas.
	Type and proofread correspondence, forms and other documents.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application&nbsp;to:&nbsp;conciseglobalhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },
  "jobLocation": {

  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",

Administrative Assistant Job at Frances Mcgreg Consulting




        
    

        
        Frances Mcgreg Consulting (FMC) Services is a full-fledged business consulting company that covers talent acquisition and management, data analysis, organizational design and development, humanitarian activities and SDGs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a responsible and agile Administrative assistant to perform a variety of administrative and clerical tasks which include providing support to our walk-in clients and employees, assisting in daily office needs and managing our company’s general administrative activities.


Job Responsibilities


	Attend to walk-in clients and answer to their inquiries.
	Submitting and reconciling expense reports.
	Arranging vehicle transportation, maintenance, and insurance.
	Order office supplies and maintain inventory, maintaining office stationery supplies and distribution.
	Assist with shortlisting candidates and scheduling interviews.
	Maintaining a filing system to ensure the safekeeping of confidential materials.
	Researching and retrieving statistical data from internal and external sources.
	Following up on deadlines and commitments.
	Supporting office maintenance and assets management.
	Determine and establish office procedures and routines.
	Schedule and confirm appointments.
	Answer telephone and relay telephone calls and messages.
	Answer electronic enquiries.
	Compile data and other information.
	Arrange travel, and elated itineraries and make reservations.
	Greet people and direct them to contacts or service areas.
	Type and proofread correspondence, forms and other documents.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application to: conciseglobalhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
